reporter_caption.center: IN RE AMEND. TO RULES FOR FEES COSTS OF CIR. COURTS (Wyo. 2003)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF AMENDMENTS TO THE RULES FOR FEES AND COSTS FOR

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER This matter came before the Court by direction of the Board of Judicial Policy and Administration to amend the Rules for Fees and Costs for Circuit Courts, Rule 1. It is therefore,
ORDERED that the amendments to the Rules for Fees and Costs for Circuit Courts, Rule 1, a copy of which is attached hereto, are adopted; that said rule shall be published in the advance sheets of the Pacific Reporter and in the Wyoming Reporter; that said rule shall become effective January 1, 2003, shall be spread at length upon the journal of this court and shall thereupon supercede the current Rule 1 of the Rules for Fees and Costs for Circuit Courts.
Dated this 17th day of December, 2002.
BY THE COURT:
WILLIAM U. HILL
Chief Justice
